refnamediv.refpurpose: Overview of Virtuoso Server Pages (VSP) syntax

itemizedlist.listitem: The pages with active content are named Virtuoso Server Pages, or VSP in short.
These pages consist of Virtuoso PL and HTML code.
The Virtuoso Web server executes only files (resources) with the ".vsp" extension.
The VSP file can contain VSP blocks and HTML blocks

listitem.para: The VSP block contains the PL code

itemizedlist.listitem: The <?vsp marks the beginning of a VSP block.
The ?> marks the end of a VSP block.
The HTML block is everything outside of a VSP block.

listitem.para: The VSP shortcut in an HTML block is used to include value.

itemizedlist.listitem: The <?= marks the beginning of VSP shortcut.
The ?> marks the end of a VSP shortcut.

refsect1.title: Example
refsect1.para: The demonstration page uses the <?= <?vsp markup and SQL expressions to generate html content from within a VSP loop.
